name: IKIGAI
description:
Finding purpose in life must be difficult for almost everyone (me included), but have you stopped and think what does it mean to find your purpose in life?

A couple years ago I found out this Japanese concept called IKIGAI, it can be translated as 'enjoyment of living'.

Your IKIGAI consists in asking yourself 4 questions:

Are you doing what you love? (red)

that your community needs? (blue)

that you are good at? (green)

and you can be paid for? (yellow)

And by asking these questions, you'll find out your Passion (orange), your Mission (Purple), your Vocation (Turquoise), and your Profession (Lime-green).

Maybe you are not good at all the things you love, or you are not sure what career to pursue yet, but we are only humans, and as humans we are here to grow and discover ourselves.
